artist: Artist: Alexander Calder; Author: Henri Laugier , et al.; Publisher: Éditions Pierre à Feu, Maeght, Paris
description: paper periodical with title across top; author name across bottom; white cover; yellow circle with a black and white spiral shape in upper left quadrant; line drawing in center with black, white and red circles flanking end of lines; black triangle and squiggly shape along lower center; lender's archive #127

medium: Color lithographs, illustrations in black and white and color; letterpress
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis
title: Derrière le Miroir, No. 31
